roleset.name: provide unwanted help, interfering

role.descr: specific aspect of arg being interfered with

example.name: meddle-v: nasty trace chain
example.text: It originates in a Bush administration decision not to antagonize the U.S. Congress and avoid , at all costs , being accused of meddling in the region .

example.name: meddling-n: all args
example.text: This primarily changed during FDR 's administration , when his stacked court rubber - stamped his economic meddling in the lives of individuals .

example.name: do_meddling-n: Light Verb
example.text: Not to mention the meddling we have been doing inside Iran for the past 100 years or so ... installing the shah .. overthrowing democratic governments ...

propbank.arg: for the past 100 years or so
installing the shah .. overthrowing democratic governments ...

roleset.note: MEDDLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'meddle' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from meddle.01-v predicate notes)
MEDDLING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, meddle.01. No VNcls. (from meddling.01-n)
